abstract: The China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, the oil and refining giant better known as Sinopec, said proceeds from the private placement of new shares would be used to finance business development.
snippet: The China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, the oil and refining giant better known as Sinopec, said proceeds from the private placement of new shares would be used to finance business development.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG – The China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, the state-owned oil and refining giant better known as Sinopec, is selling new shares worth up to 24 billion Hong Kong dollars, or $3.1 billion.

headline.main: Sinopec to Raise $3.1 Billion in Hong Kong
